name: Discovering The Solar System
description:
PLZ PLAY THE GAME ON FULLSCREEN MODE IF PLAYING ON WEB.

This game was made by 2 students in 6 days for ATL Space Challenge 2021(Exploring Space). This game teaches us about some celestial bodies of solar system.

You have to fill 5 inputs and on the basis of your inputs and our data, The game will tell you about that planet

We have a limited data so it may not be the celestial body that you are thinking.
